title: Is it permissible to work for halal company whose 70% clients are Alcohol companies? assim al hakeem
transcript: I got a job I got a job opportunity in an MNC in India and it is a project for us client company they have 100 years experience in making the glass containers and they are selling the specially designed glass bottles for alcohol companies for and beer bottles and the food companies like ketchup soup bottles and pharmaceutical companies I could see from the internet that 60 to 70% of their income is coming from alcohol companies I'll be handling the task in the back end my role will be is taking the orders to posting the cash into sap Finance finance application or any any position position in between the order to cash process in the back end office I may need to handle the alcohol based customers or customer orders and assist their queries like uh with regards to orders and finance and prices okay ABD your question is crystal clear if the company has 70% of her client Els dealing in alcohol it is not permissible for you at all to work there and to assist them because the vast majority of your clients would be using it in something that Allah cursed anyone who's dealing with it including you so definitely you don't want to have your income tarnished or soiled by such clientele so definitely you should not work there at all
